HEADER.Title: publish xml and print in job report

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :SET &UC4RB_VER_RESPONSE# = ""
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &NL# = UC_CRLF() : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_FILE(&AGENT#,&UC4RB_TEMP_FILE_PATH#,,,,'UC_LOGIN=&LOGIN#') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &LINE#=GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#) : SET &UC4RB_VER_RESPONSE# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_VER_RESPONSE#, &LINE#) : SET &UC4RB_VER_RESPONSE# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_VER_RESPONSE#, &NL#) : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
! check if xml is found or not : IF &UC4RB_VER_RESPONSE# = "" : PRINT "ERROR: Unable to retrieve response." : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="Unable to retrieve response!!" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=50 : ENDIF
! Printing in the report : PRINT &UC4RB_VER_RESPONSE#
! Delete temporary file : SET &UC4RB_DELETE_FILE#=&UC4RB_TEMP_FILE_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PUB.INCLUDE.DELETE_FILE :ENDIF
:PUBLISH &UC4RB_VER_RESPONSE#,,"WORKFLOW"
